price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߜߙߊ߬ ( ߊߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߬ )߸ ߡߍ߲ ߕߍ߫ ߝߏߦߌ߬ ߘߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߝߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߋ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߘߊ߲߫ ߠߊ߫؟
arabic: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـٔٗا وَهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ayush'rikūna mā lā yakhluqu shayan wahum yukh'laqūna
